Configuration.Name: ALMA_BORROWING_REQUEST_SENDER
Configuration.Author: Bill Jones, SUNY Geneseo; Tim Jackson, SUNY SLSS; and Angela Persico, University at Albany
Configuration.Description: This Server addon allows ILLiad to send an Interlibrary Loan Borrowing request to Alma via the Alma Users API.

Setting.name: AddonWorkerName
Setting.Description: This is the name you give the Addon for the rerun checker. If you are using more than one Addon, give each Addon a different name.

Setting.name: Alma_Base_URL
Setting.Description: This setting value is the base URL for Alma API. It is your Alma API server,i.e., https://api-na.hosted.exlibrisgroup.com/almaws/v1.

Setting.name: Alma_Institution_Code
Setting.Description: This is your institutional Alma Code. Example: 01SUNY_GEN

Setting.name: Full_Alma_URL
Setting.Description: This is your Full Alma URL. Example: https://suny-gen.alma.exlibrisgroup.com

Setting.name: Alma_Users_API_Key
Setting.Description: Input your Alma Users API Key (Read and Write access needed).

Setting.name: Alma_Bibs_API_Key
Setting.Description: Input your Alma Bibs API Key (Read access needed).

Setting.name: SRU_Lookup_Username
Setting.Description: This is the username for your SRU Lookup. Leave blank if you do not use a username and password.

Setting.name: SRU_Lookup_Password
Setting.Description: This is the password for your SRU Lookup. Leave blank if you do not use a username and password.

Setting.name: EnableSendingBorrowingRequests
Setting.Description: This setting determines if you want to enable sending Borrowing Requests to Alma.

Setting.name: EnableSendingHoldRequests
Setting.Description: This setting determines if you want to enable sending Hold Requests to Alma.

Setting.name: PreferElectronicOverPrintForHoldRequests
Setting.Description: This setting determines if you want to use electronic items for Hold request fulfillment before using physical print items.

Setting.name: ItemSearchQueue
Setting.Description: The queue the Addon will monitor to process new Borrowing requests.

Setting.name: ItemSuccessQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if the Borrowing Request is submitted to Alma successfully.

Setting.name: ItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if the Borrowing Request Alma API call fails.

Setting.name: ItemSuccessHoldRequestQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if the Hold Request Alma API call fails.

Setting.name: ItemFailHoldRequestQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if the Hold Request Alma API call fails.

Setting.name: ElectronicItemSuccessQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if a local electronic item is found for the matching ISBN or OCLC Number.

Setting.name: ElectronicItemReviewQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if a local electronic item is found for the matching ISBN or OCLC Number.

Setting.name: NoISBNandNoOCLCNumberReviewQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if the Hold Request Alma API call fails.

Setting.name: ItemInExcludedLocationNeedsReviewQueue
Setting.Description: The queue a Transaction will be moved to if the Borrowing Request Alma API call fails.

Setting.name: ILLiadFieldforElectronicItemURL
Setting.Description: The name of the Transaction field you would like to use to store the URL for the found owned Electronic item (if URL is available)

Setting.name: FieldtoUseForUserNameFromUsersTable
Setting.Description: When set to true, the username will be the SSN field from the Users table instead of the Username field from the Transactions table.
